title: DLP Profiles
description: Data Loss Prevention profiles are a set of entries that can be matched in HTTP bodies or files. They are referenced in Zero Trust Gateway rules.

links.title: List all profiles
links.description: Lists all DLP profiles in an account.

links.title: Get DLP Profile
links.description: Fetches a DLP profile by ID. Supports both predefined and custom profiles

links.title: Get predefined profile
Get custom profile
Create custom profiles
links.description: Creates a set of DLP custom profiles.
links.curl:
curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/01a7362d577a6c3019a474fd6f485823/dlp/profiles/custom" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"profiles":[{"name":"Generic CVV Card Number","description":"A standard CVV card number","entries":[{"name":"Credit card (Visa)","enabled":true,"pattern":{"regex":"^4[0-9]{6,}$","validation":"luhn"}}]}]}'

enabled.description: Whether the entry is enabled or not.

pattern.title: Pattern
pattern.description: A pattern that matches an entry

validation.description: Validation algorithm for the pattern. This algorithm will get run on potential matches, and if it returns false, the entry will not be matched.

links.title: Update predefined profile
links.description: Updates a DLP predefined profile. Only supports enabling/disabling entries.

enabled.description: Wheter the entry is enabled or not.

links.title: Update custom profile
links.curl:
curl -X PUT "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/01a7362d577a6c3019a474fd6f485823/dlp/profiles/custom/384e129d-25bd-403c-8019-bc19eb7a8a5f" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"name":"Generic CVV Card Number","description":"A standard CVV card number","entries":[{"id":"719d1215-260f-41d0-8c32-eb320ad107f7","name":"Credit card (Visa)","profile_id":"f174e90a-fafe-4643-bbbc-4a0ed4fc8415","enabled":true,"pattern":{"regex":"^4[0-9]{6,}$","validation":"luhn"},"created_at":"2014-01-01T05:20:00.12345Z","updated_at":"2014-01-01T05:20:00.12345Z"}]}'

entries.description: The entries for this profile. Array elements with IDs are modifying the existing entry with that ID. Elements without ID will create new entries. Any entry not in the list will be deleted.

items.title: Custom entry
items.description: A custom entry that matches a profile

enabled.description: Whether the entry is enabled or not.

pattern.title: Pattern
pattern.description: A pattern that matches an entry

validation.description: Validation algorithm for the pattern. This algorithm will get run on potential matches, and if it returns false, the entry will not be matched.

parameters.title: Update custom profile

items.title: Predefined entry
items.description: A predefined entry that matches a profile

enabled.description: Whether the entry is enabled or not.

items.title: Custom entry
items.description: A custom entry that matches a profile

enabled.description: Whether the entry is enabled or not.

pattern.title: Pattern
pattern.description: A pattern that matches an entry

validation.description: Validation algorithm for the pattern. This algorithm will get run on potential matches, and if it returns false, the entry will not be matched.

objects.title: Custom profile

object_definition.title: DLP Profiles
object_definition.description: Data Loss Prevention profiles are a set of entries that can be matched in HTTP bodies or files. They are referenced in Zero Trust Gateway rules.
